item.title: ringzer0 CTF - Jail Escaping Bash
item.description: Here are my solutions for the ringzer0 Jail Escaping shell challenges. Level1 evel1@ringzer0team.com's password: RingZer0 Team Online CTF BASH Jail Level 1: Current user is uid=1000(level1) gid=1000(level1) groups=1000(level1) Flag is located at /home/level1/flag.txt Challenge bash code: ----------------------------- while : do echo "Your input:" read input output=`$input` done ----------------------------- You can spawn a shell using: /bin/bash Although you can’t read (you could redirect stdout to stderr) files, you can try to run commands based on the file content:
